00028 #ifndef __D3D9DRIVER_H__

00035 {
00036 
00037     class D3D9VideoModeList;
00038     class D3D9VideoMode;
00039 
00040     class _OgreD3D9Export D3D9Driver : public ResourceAlloc
00041     {
00042     
00043     public:
00044         // Constructors
00045         D3D9Driver();                       // Default
00046         D3D9Driver( const D3D9Driver &ob ); // Copy
00047         D3D9Driver( unsigned int adapterNumber, 
00048             const D3DCAPS9& deviceCaps,
00049             const D3DADAPTER_IDENTIFIER9& adapterIdentifer, 
00050             const D3DDISPLAYMODE& desktopDisplayMode);
00051         ~D3D9Driver();
00052 
00053                 
00054         const D3DCAPS9&     getD3D9DeviceCaps   () const { return mD3D9DeviceCaps; }
00055         String              DriverName          () const;
00056         String              DriverDescription   () const;
00057                 
00058         unsigned int                    getAdapterNumber    () const { return mAdapterNumber; }
00059         const D3DADAPTER_IDENTIFIER9&   getAdapterIdentifier() const { return mAdapterIdentifier; }
00060         const D3DDISPLAYMODE&           getDesktopMode      () const { return mDesktopDisplayMode; }
00061         D3D9VideoModeList*              getVideoModeList    ();
00062             
00063     private:                
00064         // Adapter number.
00065         unsigned int            mAdapterNumber;
00066         
00067         // Device caps.
00068         D3DCAPS9                mD3D9DeviceCaps;        
00069         
00070         // Adapter identifier
00071         D3DADAPTER_IDENTIFIER9  mAdapterIdentifier;
00072 
00073         // Desktop display mode.
00074         D3DDISPLAYMODE          mDesktopDisplayMode;
00075 
00076         // Video modes list.
00077         D3D9VideoModeList*      mVideoModeList; 
00078     };
